column4: Actually if you aren't a hardcore gamer the best video card for linux would be the Radeon 9200
because the Radeon 9200 is the last Radeon that has an open source driver
what can i do for you
Nothing, I was talking about the video card. :)
Change your nick and you don't have problems. :)
Why are you named after them then?
im not the one to ask about that, you need to speak to my parents
I love the video card though. :D
Either calm down or change your nick to something that isn't a video card.
Don't give advice like that again.
I'm beginning to think you're only here to troll.
You'll get them when breezy ships. ;)
Do you have a use for 30?
im gonna distribute them to my skewl
They will be, but breezy will be out by then.
